info.description: This is the Penguin Statistics v3 Backend, implemented for best performance, scalability, and reliability.
info.title: Penguin Statistics API

parameters.description: Global or Personal; default to global
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Global or Personal; default to global
parameters.name: source

400.description: Invalid or missing itemId. Notice that this shall be the **string ID** of the item, instead of the internally used numerical ID of the item.

post.description: Submit a Drop Report. You can use the `reportHash` in the response to recall the report in 24 hours after it has been submitted.
Recall a Drop Report by its `reportHash`. The farest report you can recall is limited to 24 hours. Recalling a report after it has been already recalled will result in an error.

400.description: `reportHash` is missing, invalid, or already been recalled.

post.description: Submit an Item Drop Report with Frontend Recognition. Notice that this is a **private API** and is not designed for external use.

200.description: Report has been successfully submitted for queue processing
Drop Matrix Response: when `interval` has been left undefined.

202.description: Trend Response: when `interval` has been defined a value greater than `0`. Notice that this response still responds with a status code of `200`, but due to swagger limitations, to denote a different response with the same status code is not possible. Therefore, a status code of `202` is used, only for the purpose of workaround.

parameters.description: Whether to query for personal drop matrix or not. If `is_personal` equals to `true`, a valid PenguinID would be required to be provided (PenguinIDAuth)
parameters.name: is_personal

parameters.description: Whether to show closed stages or not
parameters.name: show_closed_zones

parameters.description: Comma separated list of stage IDs to filter
parameters.name: stageFilter

parameters.description: Comma separated list of item IDs to filter
parameters.name: itemFilter

parameters.description: Whether to query for personal drop matrix or not. If `is_personal` equals to `true`, a valid PenguinID would be required to be provided (PenguinIDAuth)
parameters.name: is_personal

parameters.description: Show all patterns; default to false
parameters.name: showAllPatterns

400.description: Invalid or missing stageId. Notice that this shall be the **string ID** of the stage, instead of the internally used numerical ID of the stage.

200.description: User ID. In the deprecated backend this is, for some reason, been implemented to return a JSON in the response body but with a `Content-Type: text/plain` in the response header instead of the correct `Content-Type: application/json`. So the v2 API has replicated this behavior to ensure compatibility.

400.description: Invalid or missing zoneId. Notice that this shall be the **string ID** of the zone, instead of the v3 API internally used numerical ID of the zone.

stageType.description:
StageType is the type of the stage
* MAIN - Mainline Stages
* SUB - Sub Stages
* ACTIVITY - Activity Stages
* DAILY - Daily Stages

message.example: invalid request: some or all request parameters are invalid

source.description: Source describes a source of the report. Third-party API consumers should change this to their own name.

version.description: Version describes the version of the source app used to submit this report. Third-party API consumers should change this to their own app version.
